meanings.definition: (Latin) feminine singular of plenus; full, complete, abundant
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) feminine singular of plenus; full, complete, abundant

inflection.notes: Feminine singular form of the Latin adjective plenus.

usage_notes.explanation: Used in Latin to describe a feminine noun that is full, complete, or abundant. The adjective must agree in gender, number, and case with the noun it modifies.

readability_explanation.text: This is a Latin adjective. Understanding requires knowledge of Latin grammar, including adjective declension and agreement.
